results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse speaks directly about the divine peace that comes from God, surpassing human comprehension.
results.reflection: God's peace protects and calms our hearts amidst life's uncertainties.

results.text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
results.reason: Jesus promises His unique peace to His followers, contrasting it with worldly peace.
results.reflection: Jesus offers a peace that calms fears and steadies troubled hearts.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse highlights the connection between trusting in God and experiencing His perfect peace.
results.reflection: Trusting God brings a profound peace that steadies our minds.

results.text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
results.reason: Paul encourages believers to let Christ's peace govern their interactions and relationships.
results.reflection: Christ's peace should guide our hearts and unify us in thankfulness.

results.text: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
results.reason: This verse attributes peace as a blessing from the Lord, alongside strength.
results.reflection: God's blessings of strength and peace equip us for life's challenges.
